name: Space War (itch) (xser0)
description:
At the moment, this is a common shooter to kill time. I do not plan to develop the project further, because lost interest in it and no ideas for development.

In theory, there is a smartphone control, but I DO NOT RECOMMEND trying to play this way. The movement is not brought to mind and what is most important is very poor optimization.

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • LMB - shoot
  • Q - mega ultra endless shield
    • also left unnecessary buttons for the player:
  • NUM 1 - debug info
  • NUM 2 - kill player
  • C - add more enemys
